text: kipa witak eheta meheta gassuwata passe kulu natun kandayama aayimath halme yanawa.
alaka welaka malu alla athi ekek we nam magurekuge, hungekuge, ankuttekuge animakata lakwi nathnam ee malu allimen wadak natha.

janadhipathi maithripala sirisena ge shri lanka nidahas pakshaya (shrilanipa), agamathi ranil wika්ramasinha ge eksath jathika pakshaya (ejapa), janatha wimukthi peramuna, demala jathika sandhanaya, muslim konga්rasaya saha wathukaraye wiwidha wruththiya samithi saha sandhana athulu dhanapathi paksha saha dhanapathi ka්ramaye aarakshakayan wana wika්ramabahu karunarathnage nawa sama samaja pakshaya (nasasapa) wani wyaja-wama paksha walata erehiwa mema mathiwaranayedi tharaga wadina ekama kamkaru panthika pakshaya sasapa yi.”

demala jathika sandhanaye yapanaya disthrik parlimenthu manthri suresh premachandran prakasha kale 18 wani aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanayata erehiwa thama pakshaya chandaya dun nisa boho denaku thama pakshaya pilibandawa wiwidha arthakathanayan idiripath kala bawayi.
thayi bhashawen pansala handinwenuye wat namini.ewan pansal dasa dahasak pamana erata we.

batahira ratawal janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata ha hamuda niladharinta erehiwa eeniya yuddha aparadha sambandhayen kriyathmaka wiya haki bawa apa me thiruwen penwa dunne yuddha aparadha gana sakachcha nowu kalayakaya.

siyadiwi nasa ganima wani karunu adhyayanayata awashya samaja widya menma manowidyathmaka hadarimak mama kisida nokala ayek wima hethukota gena mewani sanwedi mathrukawak sambandhayen tharka kirima kese wethath adahas pala kirimada watinakamen thoradeyak wiya haka.
danuma bedimata amatharawa, samahara wita eya obe ruchikathwaya kumakda kiyala balanna liyapu deyak wennath puluwan.
"soba dahama adhyayanaye yedena mage sobawaya kumakdayi mata thora dunne mage aacharyawarayayi.
meke siyayata 20 k komis mudal washayen damala.
ese nokaranawa nowe.
amma kamathi weyida hansi mageth ekka ehema gamanak yana ekata?
me widiyo dasuna narambaa ee bawa hondin awabodha karagatha hakiyi.
nithi bawun wadana api me gaman karamin sitinne thirisan yugayak karama noweda?
dan me samaje thiyenawane honda ekayi naraka ekayi kiyala dekak.
ige­nime kata­yu­thu­wala di uthsa­haya thula sarthaka prathi­pala labiya hakiya.
rajaya wisin wen kara athi ganwathura aadhara labadima sandaha wayasa awurudu 24 k wana wiwahaka kanthawakagen lingika allasak illa ayawa apayojanayata lak kirimata uth...
ee prakashaya nisa oba doshadarshanayata lak wuna..?
ema gediya parikshawe prathipala mata dina 5 kin danaganna labuna.
pahatha widiyowa narambaimen obata meya sidukarana ayuru thawath pahadili karagatha hakiya.
aliyew pramukha ohuge lamayi thidena dubayihi dolar miliyana 75k watina depola milata gath bawata anawaranaya wiya.
'da bold soprano', 'da pikchar", 'da lesan', ' amedi', 'rayinosiras' ohuge janapriya wikararupi natya athara weyi.
mata mulinma oyalagen podi illimak karanna thiyanawa...
pashan sinawen purna-matha haduwak saba aadaraya lakshanayak.
namuth mema gataluwe bhayanakama thaththwaya meya nowe.
kruthima ath ha pada nipadaweyi.
eeka thamayi samagam samuhika giwisum walata yanna upayogi kara ganna minum danda.
pasal shishyayada ohuge piya da polisiyata paminili idiripath kara athi athara ee pilibandawa nithimaya prashna matha aya athadanguwata ganimata polisiyata nohaki wi atha.

sigiriya kayamwala wawe wati gilemin siti gon bandi karaththayak gonath samanga paya bhagayaka kalayak thula goda ganimata hakiwini.eeye (29) dahawal githayakata pasubim darshanayak widiyo gathakaramin sitiyadi mema akarathabbaya siduwini.awata siti tharunayaku ha rugatha kirimata pamini siti pirisa waha idiripathwi pihiyak ragenawith karaththaya bandi gonage belle thibu lanuwa kapa dama gona goda gena pasuwa karaththaya goda gathha..
dipthimath nil warnayen yuthu aawaranaya samaga dawasa aarambha kota rathri kalaye di thawath warnayak wetha maru kirimata dan obata hakiya.
obata niwan suwa!
winage muna penune naha.
mama – bana wanchawen sama pudgalayekuge naya barata ru 20,000k ekathu karala
math wanawata wadiya, sihiyen sitima hondayi yaluwa.....
ethanayi apa dakina warada saha pramadaya thiyenne.
me dawas wala api kampas yanne na.
meka sidda wune api umbaa dan inna rate iddi malayo . .

ee hinda wishesha wadapiliwelak dalalu thiyenne haki ikmanin post karanna.
me gana kisiweku pothak pala kara naha.
mata pemwathiyak innawa kiyana eka mama nam hanganne naha.
mita amatharawa kem kipayak amma langa thibuna.
- dilum wenuwen goda nagunu sayibaraye pinen pirunu aramunaka awasanaya wetha api langa wuyemu....

pahasu pasalak laba ganimata ketharam uthsaha kalath eya bari wu nisa dan aya ehi uganwayi.
thaththa ekka kayiwaru gahala yanna yanawa..

ow, ape yaluwo kipa denek ekathu karagena upandinaya samaruwa.
ammo nathinam illan kamak thamayi.
ema uthamayath me uthsawayata aaradana kalanam .

ithin hadawatha ho shariraye ath pa wani kotas ahimi wunath nomari jiwath wennata puluwan.

mema smaraka ha samadhi salakiya yuthu tharame jiwitha haniyak wu nagarawala idikara atha.engalanthaye sadamtan, liwarpul ha belfast, amarikawe niwyork ha woshintan, ayarlanthaye kwinstawun ee atharin pradhana we.
eeka thibune lumbini rangahale.

samanola watiya shri lankawe uththungama girihisa nowuna da eya shri lankawe anabhibhawaniya girihisa bawa awiwadithaya.samanola girihisa muduna, budun wahansege siripa satahana nisa ma ema kanduwatiya pujaniya wannasema eeta ananya wu parisarika bhugoliya samajiya suwisheshithwaya nisa da ehi anabhibhawaniyathwayata sirilaka an kisidu kanduwatiyakata aasanna wimatawath nohaki tharam ya.budun wahansege athipujaniya siripa satahan wandanamana kirima sandaha me uththungagiri hisa tharanaya kirima dushkara eheth jiwithaye ekwarak ho kala yuthu karyayak se sirilak wasin wishwasa karathi.apurwathwaya wanne sinhala bodunuwan pamanak nowa anya aagamikayan ge da anyawargikayange da samana gaurawa bahumanayata shri padasthanaya lakwima ya.siripa wandana samaye ithihasaya, lankiya ithihasaya tharam digu wuwaki.

thira darshana, wes mosthara rachanaya, rangalokaya, kalamanakarithwaya aadi siyalu anga lakshanawalin kramawath bawak matha rangaya uthkarshayata nanwalima magin prekshaka aakarshanaya dinaganimata samath wu mehi nitharama wenas wana rawanage his dahaya prekshakaya mawitha karawanasulu wu mul kruthiya thula janaka rajuge dunna namena kala githayak nikuth kala athara, ginna awilennata wuye ewitayi.

math enna hitiye.

hadala baluwama aththatama kanna aasa hithena, wenas rasak apita danuna.
beheth warga dekayi thawama !

emenma, deshapalanaya thula maithrige idiri jiwithaya kelesa wisandenu athda ?

aaye mathak wunoth awith danna.
prashnayak wunama bahira udawwak hoyanna kalin thamanta wisandaganna puluwan deyakda kiyala balana eka japan krame wunath, ee wade wada pahasuwen karanne kohomada kiyala lankawe aya dannawa.
“ee katha karanne katada kawuda kiyala mata hitha ganna bari wuna..”

sancharaka shri lanka pila saha ostreliya krikat sabhapathige kandayama athara kanbara nuwara pawathwena thundina puhunu tharagaye dewani dinaya wu eeye tharagaya nathara karana wita siya palamu inima krida karana shri lankawa kadulu 4k dawi lakunu 276k laba sitiyeya.ee ostreliya krikat sabhapathige pila palamu inime di kadulu 6kata ras kala lakunu 439ta pilithuru washayeni.pereda nodawi lakunu 172k labasiti ostreliya krikat sabhapathige pile aarambhaka pithikaru skot henri eeye siya dwithwa shathakaya wartha kirimata samathwiya.ohu nodawi lakunu 207k labagaththeya.shri lankawe palamu inime di wishishta pithiharambaayaka nirathawu thilakarathna dilshan shathakayak laba gath athara kumar sangakkara lakunu 55k ras kaleya.aarambhaka pithikaru dimuth karunarathna lakunu 40k da, nayaka mahela jayawardhana lakunu 36k da ras kala athara nodawi panduwata paharadena prasanna jayawardhana lakunu 24k saha dinesh chandimal lakunu 12k laba sitithi..

katha sankshepaya [sanskaranaya]
